sentence: For the first time in American history, our country’s debt has exceeded $30,000,000,000,000," said Arizona Rep. Debbie Lesko.

sentence: There are right-wing politicians using extremist talking points to attack Democrats on immigration and the southern border, and then there’s Debbie Lesko.
